Author: sselfpity
Text: Non hugger who craves hugs is literally my tagline like goddamn. I'm also far from my family and stuck in college, so I have a big ol' seal pillow and a hot waterbottle to make up for it lmao. I have friends here but when they try to get physically close with me even in a platonic way i just feel like a fucking cactus.

Author: TheAllMightiest
Text: This is gonna sound really Depressingâ„¢ but uh, if you have a heavy pillow or blanket, and then you get really comfy in bed under the covers and lay the heavy pillow/blanket over half your body or your shoulder, it almost feels like you have someone next to you that's rolled over and is laying against your side.  Almost.  But yeah, I have one of those weird chair-pillows and have gone to sleep underneath it more times than I'd care to admit.
